name: THEETAA
tag_list: it, consulting, cloud, offshore-software-development, quality-and-training, multimedia-services
overview:
Theetaa is a global information, technology and resourcing company with an impeccable record for designing, developing, deploying and managing end-to-end IT, Manpower and Process management services. From application development, testing and optimization through to enterprise-level cloud enablement and round the clock technical support services, Theetaa provides a truly impressive range of quality services that focus on delivering strategic value and operational efficiency for its customers.

Theetaa works with some of the well-known customer and partner from India, UK and Middle East. And, with global multi-cultural workforce individuals across locations worldwide, the company has established a strong global foundation to continue supporting its international customers and growth aspirations.

Theetaa is based out of Bangalore and Chennai in India and has regional offices across Middle East and Europe.

Below mentioned are the areas where we have strong expertise;

>> Resource Consulting >> Management Consulting >> IT Consulting >> Cloud Driven Services >> Offshore Software Development >> Quality and Training >> Multimedia Services

For more info pls visit : www.theetaa.com
